data.what_is:
Agillic is a Nordic software company enabling marketers to maximise the utilization of their data, transforming it into relevant and personalised communication, establishing lasting and meaningful relationships between people and brands.

The Agillic platform provides personalised communications to millions.

We are a technology company with one software product: The Agillic Omnichannel Marketing Automation Platform - a uniquely efficient platform that truly connects businesses and people by enabling relevant and personalised marketing communication at scale.

The companies and organisations that use Agillic do so to forge lasting and meaningful relationships with their audiences, and to achieve this, our platform uses data to enhance the relevance of customer communication. By combining data-driven customer insights with the ability to execute personalised communication, at the right time, to the right customers, we provide our clients with a head start in the battle of customer acquisition, retention and growth.

Always with a focus on quality, we have evolved our platform over the last 20 years, with both our ethos and platform being born of one simple notion: building meaningful, lasting and profitable relationships by delivering personalised communication to millions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Omnichannel Marketing Automation system, with support for a deep datamodel
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Agillic?
I highly recommend Agillic's omnichannel marketing automation system. One of the standout features is its deep data model, which allows for a highly personalized and targeted approach to marketing. Additionally, the system supports many channels, including email, SMS, and social media, making it easy to reach customers across multiple platforms. Another great thing about Agillic is its fast go-to-market time, which means that businesses can quickly implement and start seeing results from their campaigns. Overall, Agillic is a powerful tool that can help businesses effectively engage with customers and drive results in a short amount of time.

What do you dislike about Agillic?
Agillic is continually updating and developing new features, including updates to the user interface. However, at this moment, only 30% of the system has been updated with more user-friendly drag-and-drop features and improved search functionality. While it may take some time to get used to the "older" UI, it still does the job.

What problems is Agillic solving and how is that benefiting you?
I rely on Agillic as my go-to system due to its powerful mini CPD and world-class segmentation engine. The system is able to make use of both user data and behavior data gathered by Agillic itself for effective segmentation. Additionally, the system's API support makes it easy to transfer data in and out.

initial_reviews.review_title: A brilliant Marketing Automation tool with a unique set of features
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Agillic?
The ability to post from staging to production (most MA tools lack this feature and this saves a lot of time). Plus, the data structure makes retrieval of customer data and their related tables very easy.

What do you dislike about Agillic?
I can't think of anything I really dislike. The interface was a bit dated back in the day but Agillic has worked on that, too.

What problems is Agillic solving and how is that benefiting you?
For the customers I have worked with, Agillic covers many features that need external tools in other MA tools. In Agillic one can have surveys and NPS and have the responses saved directly in the customer profile without a hassle. We also have landing pages. One-to-many data is already included and has a very short learning curve. So, things are up and running much faster than one would think.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Agillic?
I highly recommend Agillic's omnichannel marketing automation system. One of the standout features is its deep data model, which allows for a highly personalized and targeted approach to marketing. Additionally, the system supports many channels, including email, SMS, and social media, making it easy to reach customers across multiple platforms. Another great thing about Agillic is its fast go-to-market time, which means that businesses can quickly implement and start seeing results from their campaigns. Overall, Agillic is a powerful tool that can help businesses effectively engage with customers and drive results in a short amount of time.

What do you dislike about Agillic?
Agillic is continually updating and developing new features, including updates to the user interface. However, at this moment, only 30% of the system has been updated with more user-friendly drag-and-drop features and improved search functionality. While it may take some time to get used to the "older" UI, it still does the job.

What problems is Agillic solving and how is that benefiting you?
I rely on Agillic as my go-to system due to its powerful mini CPD and world-class segmentation engine. The system is able to make use of both user data and behavior data gathered by Agillic itself for effective segmentation. Additionally, the system's API support makes it easy to transfer data in and out.

The CRM and Customer Services partnerships are my favorite part of this platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Agillic?
review_question_answers.answer: It's a platform that needs to be used by marketing professionals with vast knowledge of ads and customer lifecycle, so it's not very easy for beginner users to understand it at first. That would be a disadvantage for those new to automatized marketing tools such as Agillic.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Agillic solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The main problem Agillic has solved was harmonization through the different marketing strategies we use for the company, such as CRM, Customer Service, CDP, etc. We can now manage all these elements similarly, having efficiency in every one of these aspects and equilibrium of what we do and what we offer to the client.

The UI and UX of the platform is a bit heavy and requires some basic understanding of queries and code.
